sen.j: 上七軒通（かみしちけんどおり）は京都市上京区の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Kamishichiken-doori street is one of the streets running from east to west in Kamikyo Ward in Kyoto City.
Kamishichiken-doori street is a street running east-west through Kamikyo Ward in Kyoto City.
Kamishichiken-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kamigyo Ward in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 七本松通と今出川通の交差する上七軒交差点から西やや北へ、北野天満宮東門前の御前通と五辻通の交差点に至る。
sen.e: Kamishichiken-doori street runs westward and a little northward from Kamishichiken Crossing of Nanahonmatsu-doori street and Imadegawa-doori street to the crossing of Gozen-doori street and Itsutsuji-doori street in front of the east gate of Kitano-tenmangu shrine.

Kamishichiken-doori street runs westward and a little northward from Kamishichiken Crossing of Nanahonmatsu-doori street and Imadegawa-doori street to the crossing of Gozen-doori street and Itsutsuji-doori street in front of the east gate of Kitano-tenmangu shrine.

Kamishichiken-dori Street runs westward and a little northward from Kamishichiken Crossing of Nanahonmatsu-dori Street and Imadegawa-dori Street to the crossing of Onmae-dori Street and Itsutsuji-dori Street in front of the east gate of Kitano Tenmangu Shrine.
sen.cmt: ○○通の表記をすべて "-dori Street"に修正、御前通の読みの誤りを訂正、Kitano Tenmangu Shrineとしました。

sen.j: 全て上七軒の中である。
sen.e: Kamishichiken-doori street runs completely within Kamishichiken.
Kamishichiken-doori street runs completely within Kamishichiken.
Kamishichiken-dori Street runs completely within Kamishichiken.

sen.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更、"-dori Street"に修正
